page.title: 16ADULT RECREATION
page.content: When adults have free time there are a number of things they like to do. My dad likes to go{diving}on Saturday and Sunday. If he goes diving and we can't go he brings us sea urchins and shells. We like it when dad goes diving. When my mum has spare time she likes to go for a{walk}or drive to places in the car by herself. Most houses have{gardens}and some people spend a lot of time in them. My next door neighbour sits and watches {T.V.}She has a gardener called Fred to do the garden for her. There are facilities in Inverness for sports such as{football, squash, {swimming, tennis}and{golf.}In autumn and winter months there are evening classes like{needle work, cooking, {keep-fit}and{art.}There are also academic classes like{maths}or{ {languages. }.
